title: Desirable North Everett Home, Huge Double Lot. Avail Sept 1st.
posting_body: *****open house sat Aug 6th 10am to 1pm.
This will be the only time to view the house and apply.
Do not miss out!*****2br/1bath 1200sq home with large open kithen and living space.
Hardwood floors on main floor and master bedroom.
Laundy room on main floor (washer/dryer stays).
Huge daylight basement perfect for hobbies and storage.
French doors open to large deck, perfect for entertaining.
Home is on a double lot with large grassy area for your kids to play.
Storage shed on property good for lawn equipment.
Parking available through alley in back of the home.
Whittier/North/Everett high schools.
Wonderful neighborhood, good parks, within 1 mile of downtown Everett.
Home is a short 15 minute commute to Boeing.
THERE IS A NON REFUNDABLE APPLICATION FEE FOR BACKGROUND AND CREDIT CHECKS
Basic terms of Lease : 1st and last month rent plus 500 damage/security deposit.
750 deposit if you have pets.
Renter pays all utilities and is responsible for lawncare .
Application fee non refundable.
1st and last month, 500 deposit plus 250 for pets..
Min credit score of 680.
